story.storykicker: After judging Nach Baliye 7, the bestselling author will host a reality show on love and relationships.
story.storybody:
Author Chetan Bhagat who made his television debut with Nach Baliye 7 last year, is all set to turn host this year with a reality show on love and relationships. The show has apparently taken inspiration from his book 2 States.

The reality TV show will feature five couples in cross-cultural marriages, similar to Chetan's book.

Also read: Nach Baliye 8: You might see these celebrity couples on the show this year

Bhagat tied the knot with Anusha (who's from Tamil Nadu) in the year 1999. The couple had a hard time convincing their parents about their alliance.

Also read: Nach Baliye 7 finale: Chetan Bhagat's performance was so bad, it was good

"Couples still continue to face rigid societal norms when they are in a cross-cultural marriage. Since Chetan is a living example of this, we thought it would be ideal if he anchored the show," a source told TOI.

Bhagat got mixed reviews for his stint in Nach Baliye last year. Here's wishing him all the best for his upcoming reality show.
